mechanics.trigger: Caster casts True Seeing on a willing creature
mechanics.outcome: Target creature gains truesight with a range of 120 feet for the spell's duration

mechanics.trigger: Creature with True Seeing observes an area
mechanics.condition: Area within 120 feet contains a secret door hidden by magic
mechanics.outcome: Creature automatically notices the secret door

mechanics.trigger: Caster casts True Seeing on a willing creature
mechanics.outcome: Target creature gains the ability to see into the Ethereal Plane out to 120 feet for the spell's duration

description_text: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are. For the duration, the creature has truesight, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.
